Method Detail

setDeliveryStatus

public void setDeliveryStatus(Iterable<DeliveryResult> result)
Set the DeliveryResult for the future and notify all waiting threads + the listeners. This should get called only on time, otherwise it will throw an IllegalStateException

Parameters:
result -

addListener

public void addListener(SMTPDeliveryFutureListener listener)
Description copied from interface: SMTPDeliveryFuture
Add the SMTPDeliveryFutureListener which will notified one the delivery is complete. If the SMTPDeliveryFuture was already completed it will notify the SMTPDeliveryFutureListener directly

Specified by:
addListener in interface SMTPDeliveryFuture

getNoWait

public Iterator<DeliveryResult> getNoWait()
Description copied from interface: SMTPDeliveryFuture
Try to get the DeliveryResult's without blocking. So if the Future.isDone() returns false it will just return null

Specified by:
getNoWait in interface SMTPDeliveryFuture
Returns:
result

getSession

public SMTPClientSession getSession()
Description copied from interface: SMTPDeliveryFuture
Return the SMTPClientSession which belongs to the SMTPDeliveryFuture. This may return null in some cases
